title: Let's discuss Insta-Locking.....
body: So for me people insta-locking has become such a problem in normals. Most of the time I just wan't to play a nice clean game, but in champion select people just insta-lock and don't call a role... Any suggestions on how Riot can fix this!?

replies.body: lets face it some times we all insta lock iv don't it this week I hate being sup every game so il insta lock for a few games there's no rule on insta locking and as for the 5 sec thing it wont work they can still just pick a champ and lock in after 5 sec you cant get this out of a game like this and if you made a rule on not insta locking how would you regulate that
there is no 5 second thing. if you dont like support stop playing league dont cry and instalock
I actually think your mindset is more toxic.
no you are just cos I insta lock 1 in 20 games don't make me toxic soz buddy
noooooooooooooooooooooooooooo you. nerrrrrrr... That's all I got out of your pre pubescent response, child. GG
yes you are toxic, and you cant see that because you're 12, and toxic, so gtfo

yes he is very toxic ad act likes a prick,one post one guy was talking about killing himself and this guy is giving him verbal harassment and telling him to stop crying over his life-whilst talking about how hard his life was-if his life was so hard why are you making other peoples life hard? didn't you hate it when your dad beat you? or was it a lie? I honestly think riot should ban this guys account
There is no rule against insta-locking, but if you wanna be some 12 year old cunt about it then go ahead cry to riot they wont listen because there is no rule about insta-locking.

For me it depends on my mood. If they instalock and are dicks about it i will happily just play who i want to play knowing that it might not result in the best team comp.  If i am in a good mood I'll pick meta but maybe pick a champ i might not be great at but want to practice. I don't worry too much about victory in normals. For me, normals are fun and an opportunity to practice new champs I am considering taking into ranked.
yeah i hat'e when people instalock. I really wan't to play a certain role, and they just tak'e it away from me despite me wan'ting it.
a 5 sec wait before lock, or just use the bloody teambuilder for everything
